Pre-Game Insights: The Bulls have gone 6-11 in home games and are third in the Eastern Conference in rebounding, averaging 45.1 rebounds per game.
The Spurs are 6-9 in road games and average 14.1 turnovers per game, performing well when committing fewer turnovers.
Nikola Vucevic leads the Bulls with 20.4 points, 10.1 rebounds, and 3.3 assists per game.
Julian Champagnie is shooting 43.3% and averaging 12.1 points for the Spurs.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game is a non-conference showdown in Chicago.
The Bulls and Spurs have specific injury statuses: Torrey Craig (Bulls) and Ayo Dosunmu (Bulls) are day-to-day, while the Spurs have no injuries listed.
